endpoints.description: Retrieve historical data related to glass production from connected manufacturing units.
Submit and analyze production process sequences to suggest potential optimization strategies.
Fetch a summary of energy consumption metrics across production facilities.
Submit production data for comprehensive quality assessment analysis.
Retrieve the latest suggested actions for improving production efficiency based on analyzed data.
Access detailed reports on raw materials utilization and efficiency.
Configure custom alerts based on specific production or quality thresholds.
Retrieve the current operational status of production monitoring systems.
Upload and integrate manually collected data into the analysis system.
Remove a specific previously configured alert based on its unique identifier.
